00038 const int ID_LEFT_SPLIT = wxNewId();

00040 
00048 wxSizer *INTERFACE( wxWindow *parent, bool call_fit, bool set_sizer )
00049 {
00050     wxBoxSizer *item0 = new wxBoxSizer( wxVERTICAL );
00051 
00052     wxSplitterWindow *item2 = new wxSplitterWindow( parent, ID_LEFT_SPLIT, wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(200,160), wxSP_BORDER|wxSP_3D|wxCLIP_CHILDREN );
00053     item0->Add( item2, 1, wxGROW|wxALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL, 5 );
00054         
00055         wxPanel * Leftwindow = new wxPanel(item2,-1);
00056         LEFT(Leftwindow,FALSE);
00057         item2->Initialize(Leftwindow);
00058         
00059         Leftwindow->Show(true);
00060         
00061         wxPanel * Rightwindow = new wxPanel(item2,-1);
00062         RIGHT(Rightwindow,FALSE);
00063         item2->Initialize(Rightwindow);
00064         Rightwindow->Show(true);
00065         
00066         item2->SplitVertically (Leftwindow,Rightwindow,150);
00067         item2->SetMinimumPaneSize(20);
00068 
00069     if (set_sizer)
00070     {
00071         parent->SetSizer( item0 );
00072         if (call_fit)
00073             item0->SetSizeHints( parent );
00074     }
00075     
00076     return item0;
00077 }

00101 wxSizer *RIGHT( wxWindow *parent, bool call_fit, bool set_sizer )
00102 {
00103     wxBoxSizer *item0 = new wxBoxSizer( wxVERTICAL );
00104 
00105     wxSplitterWindow *item1 = new wxSplitterWindow( parent, ID_RIGHT_SPLIT, wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(200,160), wxSP_BORDER|wxSP_3D|wxCLIP_CHILDREN );
00106     item0->Add( item1, 1, wxGROW|wxALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL, 5 );
00107 
00108     wxPanel * TopWindow = new wxPanel(item1,-1);
00109         RIGHT_TOP(TopWindow,FALSE);
00110         item1->Initialize(TopWindow);
00111         
00112         TopWindow->Show(true);
00113         
00114         wxPanel * BottomWindow = new wxPanel(item1,-1);
00115         RIGHT_BTM(BottomWindow,FALSE);
00116         item1->Initialize(BottomWindow);
00117         BottomWindow->Show(true);
00118         
00119         item1->SplitHorizontally (TopWindow,BottomWindow,350);
00120         item1->SetMinimumPaneSize(20);

00176 const int ID_MENU = wxNewId();
00177 const int ID_FILE_MENU = wxNewId();
00178 wxMenuBar *MENU()
00179 {
00180     wxMenuBar *item0 = new wxMenuBar;
00181     
00182     wxMenu* item1 = new wxMenu;
00183     item1->Append( ID_OPEN_DB, _("Open database...\tCtrl-O"), _("Display the dialog box for selecting the database to open") );
00184     item1->AppendSeparator();
00185     item1->Append( wxID_EXIT, _("Exit program"), _("Quit the program") );
00186     item0->Append( item1, _("File") );
00187     
00188     return item0;
00189 }
